summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1562, for the improvement of Plum Street from Rainier Avenue to Nineteenth Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 16782, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
